verses.verse: הֲיָדַ֗עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ha-ya-Da'-ta, Knowest עֵ֭ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et thou the time לֶ֣דֶת <S%H3205><s%> Le-det bring forth יַעֲלֵי־ <S%H3277><s%> ya-'a-lei- when the wild goats סָ֑לַע <S%H5553><s%> Sa-la'; of the rock חֹלֵ֖ל <S%H2342><s%> cho-Lel do calve אַיָּל֣וֹת <S%H355><s%> ai-ya-Lot when the hinds תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> tish-Mor. ;[or] canst thou mark

תִּסְפֹּ֣ר <S%H5608><s%> tis-Por Canst thou number יְרָחִ֣ים <S%H3391><s%> ye-ra-Chim the months תְּמַלֶּ֑אנָה <S%H4390><s%> te-mal-Le-nah; [that] they fulfil וְ֝יָדַ֗עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-Da'-ta, ;or knowest עֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et thou the time לִדְתָּֽנָה׃ <S%H3205><s%> lid-Ta-nah. when they bring forth

תִּ֭כְרַעְנָה <S%H3766><s%> Tich-ra'-nah They bow יַלְדֵיהֶ֣ן <S%H3206><s%> yal-dei-Hen their young ones תְּפַלַּ֑חְנָה <S%H6398><s%> te-fal-Lach-nah; themselves they bring forth חֶבְלֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H2256><s%> chev-lei-Hem their sorrows תְּשַׁלַּֽחְנָה׃ <S%H7971><s%> te-shal-Lach-nah. they cast out

יַחְלְמ֣וּ <S%H2492><s%> yach-le-Mu are in good liking בְ֭נֵיהֶם <S%H1121><s%> Ve-nei-hem Their young ones יִרְבּ֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> yir-Bu they grow up בַבָּ֑ר <S%H1250><s%> vab-Bar; with corn יָ֝צְא֗וּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'U, they go forth וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not שָׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> Sha-vu and return לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who שִׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> shil-Lach Who hath sent out פֶּ֣רֶא <S%H6501><s%> Pe-re the wild ass חָפְשִׁ֑י <S%H2670><s%> cha-fe-Shi; free וּמֹסְר֥וֹת <S%H4147><s%> u-mo-se-Rot the bands עָ֝ר֗וֹד <S%H6171><s%> a-Rod, of the swift מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who פִתֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H6605><s%> fit-Te-ach. loosed

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- to whom שַׂ֣מְתִּי <S%H7760><s%> Sam-ti I have made עֲרָבָ֣ה <S%H6160><s%> 'a-ra-Vah the wilderness בֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> vei-To; Whose house וּֽמִשְׁכְּנוֹתָ֥יו <S%H4908><s%> u-mish-ke-no-Tav land his dwellings מְלֵֽחָה׃ <S%H4420><s%> me-Le-chah. and the barren

יִ֭שְׂחַק <S%H7832><s%> Yis-chak He scorneth לַהֲמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> la-ha-Mon the multitude קִרְיָ֑ה <S%H7151><s%> kir-Yah; of the city תְּשֻׁא֥וֹת <S%H8663><s%> te-shu-'ot he the crying נ֝וֹגֵ֗שׂ <S%H5065><s%> no-Ges, of the driver לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo does not יִשְׁמָֽע׃ <S%H8085><s%> yish-Ma'. neither regardeth

יְת֣וּר <S%H3491><s%> ye-Tur The range הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim of the mountains מִרְעֵ֑הוּ <S%H4829><s%> mir-'E-hu; [is] his pasture וְאַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char after כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every יָר֣וֹק <S%H3387><s%> ya-Rok every green thing יִדְרֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H1875><s%> yid-Roosh. and he searcheth

הֲיֹ֣אבֶה <S%H14><s%> ha-Yoeh be willing רֵּ֣ים <S%H7214><s%> reim Will the unicorn עָבְדֶ֑ךָ <S%H5647><s%> 'a-ve-De-cha; to serve אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Or יָ֝לִ֗ין <S%H3885><s%> ya-Lin, thee or abide עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and אֲבוּסֶֽךָ׃ <S%H18><s%> 'a-vu-Se-cha. crib

כְּנַף־ <S%H3671><s%> ke-naf- wings רְנָנִ֥ים <S%H7443><s%> re-na-Nim [Gavest thou] the goodly נֶעֱלָ֑סָה <S%H5965><s%> ne-'e-La-sah; unto the peacocks אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo אֶ֝בְרָ֗ה <S%H84><s%> 'ev-Rah, ;or wings חֲסִידָ֥ה <S%H2624><s%> cha-si-Dah and feathers וְנֹצָֽה׃ <S%H5133><s%> ve-no-Tzah. and plumage

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for תַעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> ta-'a-Zo Which leaveth לָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> la-'A-retz in the earth בֵּצֶ֑יהָ <S%H1000><s%> be-Tzei-ha; her eggs וְֽעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- in עָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> 'a-Far them in dust תְּחַמֵּֽם׃ <S%H2552><s%> te-cham-Mem. and warmeth

וַ֭תִּשְׁכַּח <S%H7911><s%> Vat-tish-kach And forgetteth כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that רֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> Re-gel that the foot תְּזוּרֶ֑הָ <S%H2115><s%> te-zu-Re-ha; may crush וְחַיַּ֖ת <S%H2416><s%> ve-chai-Yat beast הַשָּׂדֶ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh them or that the wild תְּדוּשֶֽׁהָ׃ <S%H1758><s%> te-du-She-ha. may break

הִקְשִׁ֣יחַ <S%H7188><s%> hik-Shi-ach She is hardened בָּנֶ֣יהָ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nei-ha against her young ones לְּלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> le-lo- as though [they were] not לָ֑הּ Lah; לְרִ֖יק <S%H7385><s%> le-Rik is in vain יְגִיעָ֣הּ <S%H3018><s%> ye-gi-'Ah hers her labour בְּלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> be-li- without פָֽחַד׃ <S%H6343><s%> Fa-chad. without fear

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because הִשָּׁ֣הּ <S%H5382><s%> hish-Shah hath deprived אֱל֣וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> e-Lo-ah Because God חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah her of wisdom וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not חָ֥לַק <S%H2505><s%> Cha-lak neither hath he imparted לָ֝֗הּ Lah, בַּבִּינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> bab-bi-Nah. to her understanding

הְֽ֭תַרְעִישֶׁנּוּ <S%H7493><s%> He-tar-'i-shen-nu Canst thou make him afraid כָּאַרְבֶּ֑ה <S%H697><s%> ka-'ar-Beh; grasshopper ה֖וֹד <S%H1935><s%> Hod beauty נַחְר֣וֹ <S%H5170><s%> nach-Ro of his nostrils אֵימָֽה׃ <S%H367><s%> 'ei-Mah. [is] terrible

עָ֭לָיו <S%H5921><s%> 'A-lav against תִּרְנֶ֣ה <S%H7439><s%> tir-Neh rattleth אַשְׁפָּ֑ה <S%H827><s%> 'ash-Pah; The quiver לַ֖הַב <S%H3851><s%> La-hav against him the glittering חֲנִ֣ית <S%H2595><s%> cha-Nit spear וְכִידֽוֹן׃ <S%H3591><s%> ve-chi-Don. and the shield
